titles: Under God; humbly desiring his blessing to this famous and wonderful never-failing cordial drink of the world, the great preserver of mankind. A secret far beyond any thing yet known to the world. / Never published by any but by me Thomas Hinde G. in London, most approved and admirable for its excellent vertues and usesÂ· To be satisfied of the truth, pray read this preface.
author: Hinde, Thomas, fl. 1673.
publisher: Printed for the author, with allowance,
